<<<<<<< HEAD
The names of herbes in Greke, Latin, Englishe, Duche [and] Frenche with the commune names that herbaries and apotecaries vse. Gathered by William Turner. Turner, William, d. 1568.
[1286] p.
By [S. Mierdman for] John Day and Wyllyam Seres, dwellynge in Sepulchres Parish at the signe of the Resurrection a litle aboue Holbourne Conduite, [Imprinted at London : [1548]]
Imprint from colophon; printer's name and publication date from STC. Signatures: A-H (H8 blank). Imperfect; lacks leaves H1 and H3. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
